forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: when you are locked from an area, it should tell you how long

comments.text: same when you attempt to enter a locked area; it should tell you how much longer. (and not send you back home--seriously that is really annoying.)
i agree. there should be something like a dialog box that shows the details of the lock given if you attempt to go to an area you are locked from  instead of failing to connect.

thread.latestCommentText: i agree. there should be something like a dialog box that shows the details of the lock given if you attempt to go to an area you are locked from  instead of failing to connect.
